publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2311 John Farquhar Munro: Freedom of Information Bill - Skye Bridge Contractâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the introduction of the Freedom of Information Bill and believes that in order to restore faith in public administration, the Scottish Executive should give full disclosure of the Skye Bridge contract to demonstrate the spirit of openness which the Bill sets out to achieve. Supported by: Irene McGugan*, Richard Lochhead*, Robert Brown*, Robin Harper*, Stewart Stevenson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2311 Freedom of Information Bill - Skye Bridge Contract (lodged on 5 October 2001) Mr John McAllion*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2311 Freedom of Information Bill - Skye Bridge Contract (lodged on 5 October 2001) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2311 Freedom of Information Bill - Skye Bridge Contract (lodged on 5 October 2001) Michael Russell*, Tavish Scott*, Dr Winnie Ewing*

S1M-2311 Freedom of Information Bill - Skye Bridge Contract (lodged on 5 October 2001) Andrew Wilson*
